column2: "Afei Jehosafat nyaa adze na enyidzi piigyan; na ɔnye Ahab yɛɛ asew."
"Na mfe bi n’ekyir no osii mu kɔr Ahab nkyɛn wɔ Samaria. Na Ahab kunkum nguan na anantwi piigyan dze maa ɔno
column3: na nkorɔfo a wɔka no ho no
column4: na ɔdaadaa no dɛ ɔnye no mfow nkɔ Ramot-gilead."

column2: "Na Israelhen Ahab see Judahen Jehosafat dɛ
column3: Ana enye me bɔkɔ Ramot-gilead a? Na obuaa no dɛ
column4: Metse dɛ woara
column5: na me man tse dɛ wo man; na yɛnye wo bɔkɔ ɔsa no."

column2: "Nna Israelhen no boaboaa nkɔnhyɛfo no ano
column4: na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column7: Fow kɔ; na Nyankopɔn dze bɛhyɛ ɔhen ne nsa."

column3: Ana EWURADZE no nkɔnhyɛnyi bi so nnyi ha
column4: ma yebebisa no hɔ adze?"

column3: Ɔbarimba baako bi da ho wɔ hɔ a nkyɛ yɛnam no do bebisa EWURADZE adze: na mikyir no; osiandɛ ɔnnhyɛ mo ho nkɔm pa dɛ bɔn ara nko. Ɔno nye Imla ne ba Mikaia. Na Jehosafat see dɛ
column4: Mma mma ɔhen nnse dɛm."
Kɛfa Imla ne ba Mikaia bra ntsɛmara."

column2: "Afei Israelhen na Judahen Jehosafat tsetse hɔn ahengua do nkorkor
column4: na wɔtsetse Samaria kuropon ahɛnee gua do; na nkɔnhyɛfo no nyinara rehyɛ nkɔm wɔ hɔn enyim."

column2: "Na Kenaana ne ba Zedekia yɛɛ dadze mmbɛn
column4: Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi
column5: Iyinom na edze bosun Siriafo no araa ma wɔaahyew."

column2: "Na nkɔnhyɛfo no nyinara hyehyɛɛ nkɔm dɛm
column4: Fow kɔ Ramot-gilead
column5: na onsi wo yie: na EWURADZE dze bɛhyɛ ɔhen ne nsa."

column2: "Na ɔbɔfo no a ɔkɔr dɛ ɔrekɛfrɛ Mikaia no kaa kyerɛɛ no
column4: Hwɛ
column5: nkɔnhyɛfo nsɛm no dze anokor yi papa kyerɛ ɔhen: dɛm ntsi meserɛ wo
column6: ma w’asɛm nyɛ dɛ hɔndze no kor

column4: dza me Nyankopɔn bɛse no

column2: "Na aber a ɔbaa ɔhen no nkyɛn no
column4: Mikaia
column8: na onsi hom yie; na wobeyi hɔn ahyɛ hom nsa."

column3: Mpɛn ahen ara na menka ntam ngu wo do ma ennka hwee dɛ dza ɔyɛ nokwar nko wɔ EWURADZE ne dzin mu kyerɛ me?"
Muhun Israel nyinara dɛ wɔapetse mbepɔw do
column4: dɛ nguan a wonnyi oguanhwɛfo: na EWURADZE see dɛ
column6: nyimpa biara nkɔ ne fie asomdwee mu."

column3: Ana mannka annkyerɛ wo dɛ ɔnnkɛhyɛ mo ho nkɔm pa
column4: dɛ bɔn nko?"

column3: Dɛm ntsi hom ntsie EWURADZE n’asɛm: Muhun EWURADZE dɛ ɔtse n’ahengua do
column4: na ɔsor dɔm nyinara gyinagyina n’enyimfa na n’abankum."

column3: Woana na ɔbɛdaadaa Israelhen Ahab ma ɔaafow akɔ akɔtɔr wɔ Ramot-gilead? Na obi kasaa see dɛm
column4: na obi so see dɛm."

column2: "Na sunsum bi fiir edzi begyinaa EWURADZE enyim
column4: Mara mebɛdaadaa no. Na EWURADZE see no dɛ
na makɛyɛ sunsum torfo wɔ no nkɔnhyɛfo nyinara anomu. Na ɔsee dɛ
column6: na eso edzi nyim: fir edzi kɔ

column4: EWURADZE dze sunsum torfo ahyɛ wo nkɔnhyɛfo yi anomu; na EWURADZE akasa wo ho bɔn."

column2: "Nna Kenaana ne ba Zedekia twee pinii
column3: na ɔbɔɔ Mikaia sotɔr see dɛ
column4: Ebɛn ɔkwan do na EWURADZE no sunsum nam fi me nkyɛn bɛkaa iyi kyerɛɛ wo?"
da no a ebɔkɔ mpiakyir pia mu dɛ irukosuma woho no na ibohu."
na hom mfa no nsan nkɔ kurow no mu ambrado Amon
column5: na ɔhen ne ba Joas nkyɛn;"

column4: Hom mfa akowaa yi nto efiadze
column5: na hom mfa ahohiahia edziban na ahohiahia nsu nyɛn no
column6: na onkodu dɛ mebɛsan aba no asomdwee mu."

column3: Sɛ ɔwoara esan ba no asomdwee mu ara dze a
column4: nna nnyɛ EWURADZE na ɔnam mo do akasa. Na ɔdze sɔɔw do dɛ
column6: hom nyinara hom ntsie dza maka yi."

column2: "Na Israelhen no na Judahen Jehosafat fowee kɔr Ramot-gilead."

column4: na makɔ akono: na ɔwo dze hyɛ w’ahentar. Nna Israelhen no sakyeer noho; na wosii mu kɔr akono."

column2: "Afei Siriahen no ahyɛ ne ntseaseanam do asafohemfo no
column4: Mma hom nnye kakraba anaa kɛse nnko

column3: aber a ntseaseanam do asafohemfo no hun Jehosafat no
column4: nna wɔsee dɛ
column5: Israelhen nye no. Dɛm ntsi wotwae yeer no dɛ wɔnye no rokɔko: na Jehosafat kekaa mu
column6: na EWURADZE boaa no: na Nyankopɔn nuu hɔn mu ma wɔdanee fii no ho."

column3: aber a ntseaseanam do asafohen no hun dɛ nnyɛ Israelhen nye no
column4: nna wogyaa no tsiw saan ekyir."

column2: "Na ɔbarimba bi twee n’egyen mu a ɔannhyɛ da ara towee
column3: na ɔbɔɔ Israelhen no wɔ mbɔtoamu na akatabo no ntamu: dɛm ntsi ɔsee tseaseanam kafo no dɛ
column4: Dan wo nsa
column5: na fa me fi dɔm yi mu; na mepira dzendzen."

column2: "Na ɔko no mu yɛɛ dzen da no: naaso Israelhen no suoo noho mu gyinaa ne tseaseanam mu wɔ Siriafo no enyim araa dze kodur ewimbir: na bɛyɛ mber a wi rokɔtɔ no na owui."
